News.headline: Tickets: Maidstone United v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Tickets: Maidstone United v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Tickets: Maidstone United v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Ticket information for the Daggers' trip to The Gallagher Stadium on Tuesday 22nd November, 7:45pm KO.
News.description:
Please note:
Tickets will be pay on the day only, no tickets will be will be sold for away fans in advance by the club.
Entry will be through the general turnstiles for this game, and there will be no segregation for home and away fans.

Ticket Prices:
Adults: £15.00
Concessions (65+/students with valid ID): £12.00
Youth (11 to 16 year olds): £7.00
Junior (Under 11): £2.00
Stand seat plus £2.00 on the above prices – subject to availability.

Disabled/Wheelchair Information:
Ambulant disabled and wheelchair fans will pay the appropriate age category with the carer going free of charge.
